ghostTag.name: Presentation
ghostTag.description: You know, when you have to convince someone your idea makes sense before moving forward. Present your thinking or win new business, the act of presentation is a critically undervalued technical capability.

node.title: Health Taxonomy: NLP to Understand Health Research
node.excerpt: Google Cloud Next talk showing Natural Language Processing API usage for legal document categorization. Addresses systemic challenges in developing production AI, with a focus on healthcare considerations.
node.custom_excerpt: Google Cloud Next talk showing Natural Language Processing API usage for legal document categorization. Addresses systemic challenges in developing production AI, with a focus on healthcare considerations.
node.meta_title: Adding AI to the Healthcare toolbox
node.meta_description: Alex Welcing encourages team building for equitable AI at Google Cloud Next 2018, with a practical example from healthcare showing how NLP can save precious time.

authors.name: Alex Welcing
authors.bio: Cloud focused tech human disrupting legacy systems. Working on publishing technology for research and legal materials, leveraging the latest in Development Operations for the AI/ML future.

primary_author.name: Alex Welcing
primary_author.bio: Cloud focused tech human disrupting legacy systems. Working on publishing technology for research and legal materials, leveraging the latest in Development Operations for the AI/ML future.

primary_tag.name: Artificial Intelligence
primary_tag.description: Why think when the computer could handle it for you?

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Why think when the computer could handle it for you?

tags.name: Development
tags.description: Building code. I use whatever we need to get the job done. JavaScript, frameworks, opensource, yada yada.

tags.name: Google Cloud
tags.description: The black sheep of cloud development, Google Cloud trails AWS and Azure in adoption. But, the UI is slick and I can build everything I need from a Chromebook using Cloud Shell. Eventually, enterprises will consider spending money here as well.

tags.name: Presentation
tags.description: You know, when you have to convince someone your idea makes sense before moving forward. Present your thinking or win new business, the act of presentation is a critically undervalued technical capability.

node.plaintext:
Thanks to everyone who had a chance to attend in person or explore this
presentation post Cloud Next '18.  Democratizing AI is more important than ever,
and I am always open to questions or collaboration. Here is the video and
presentation slides.
node.html: Thanks to everyone who had a chance to attend in person or explore this presentation post Cloud Next '18.  Democratizing AI is more important than ever, and I am always open to questions or collaboration. Here is the video and presentation slides.
